description:
Takafumi`s uncle continues his story about his search to find the Shining Crusader, revealing a thoughtful side to him — almost like a real hero.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: I Got Through It by Transforming into the Most Powerful Being I Know
On a parfois besoin d`un plus fort que soi
Ore no Shiru Saikyou no Seibutsu ni Henshin Shite Kirinuketanda
俺の知る最強の生物に変身して切り抜けたんだ
